TEXT.English: Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities on the historical route[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot spread after 1500 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources (especially Silk resources)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Tribalism or Free Market civics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Being the Mongolian civilization[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Markets, Grocers[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Being the Chinese civilization[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Coastal cities without a Harbor[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Christian state religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present

Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities belonging to the Spanish, French, English, Portuguese, Dutch or Viking civilizations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot spread after 1800 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities in the Caribbean, Sub-Saharan Africa, South Asia or cities that have the Trading Corporation National Wonder[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread into coastal cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Mercantilism or Free Market civic[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Being the Dutch civilization[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Harbors, Customs Houses, Banks, Trading Company (National Wonder)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities in the Caribbean[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present

Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Free Market civic[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Granaries, Grocers, Supermarkets[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Competition with the Fishing Industry company[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Side effects:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can cause [ICON_UNHAPPY] in your cities

Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread into coastal cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Free Market civic[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lighthouses, Harbors, Supermarkets[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Competition with the Cereal Industry company[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Side effects:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can cause [ICON_UNHAPPY] in your cities

Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot spread after 1920 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Free Market civic[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Markets, Factories[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Competition with the Steel Industry company[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Side effects:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can cause [ICON_UNHAPPY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] in your cities
